entry.tran: 晒伤;(因过度晒太阳而引起的)皮肤灼伤
entry.def: If someone has sunburn, their skin is bright pink and sore because they have spent too much time in hot sunshine.

example.ex: The risk and severity of sunburn depend on the body's natural skin colour...
example.tran: 晒伤的风险和严重程度取决于人体的自然肤色。

example.ex: I was concerned that I was not protected and would get a sunburn.
example.tran: 我很担心我未作任何防护可能会被晒伤。
